item.title: Report X-2025030929
item.description:
Report X-2025030929

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-22T21:13:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-13
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER CONSULTED WITH THE DECSION TREE WHICH LED TO THE CORROSIVE RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE RESPONSE CLEAN UP ON THE PAGE. BROUGHT THE LEAKER BACK TO DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL. LEAKER WAS PROPERLY DISPOSED OF.

item.title: Report X-2025030518
item.description:
Report X-2025030518

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-06
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2025030518 A LEAKING HAZMAT WAS DISCOVERED ON THE NORTH UNLOAD. THE RESPONDERS USED ALL NECESSARY PPE AND DECISION TREE TO CLEAN UP THE SPILL. 2. X-2025030519 THE RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO A LEAKING HAZMAT ON THE NORTH UNLOAD, USING ALL NECESSARY PPE AND DECISION TREE, THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED SPILL TUB AND LIQUID WAS ABSORBED USING ZEP ZORBENT. 3. X-2025030520 RESPONDERS WERE CALLED TO DOOR 27. ENTERED TRAILER IN FULL PPE AND DECISIOON TREE. UNLOADED TRAILER TO GET TO LEAKER. REMOVED LEAKER AND CLEANED UP SPILL. REMOVED ALL DAMAGED PACKAGES AND RETURNED TO DMP WITH ALL DAMAGES. 4. X-2025030522 NO COMMENTS PROVIDED.

item.title: Report X-2025030120
item.description:
Report X-2025030120

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-26
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS LOCATED AT THE HAZMAT AUDIT STATION IN DMP. RMP WAS AUDITING HAZMAT PACKAGES. HE PICKED UP THE PACKAGE IN QUESTION TO BEGIN HIS AUDIT PROCESS BUT QUICKLY NOTICED AN ODOR EMANATING FROM THE PACKAGE. THERE WAS NO VISIBLE EVIDENCE THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING. THEN GOT A UPS DESIGNATED RESPONDER TO RESPOND TO THE PACKAGE AND PERFORM A DAMAGE INSPECTION. UPON OPENING, TWO BOTTLES INSIDE WERE IDENTIFIED AS LEAKING VERY SLOWLY FROM THIER CLOSURE. PROPER DMP PROCEDURES WERE THEN FOLLOWED AND THE PRODUCT DISPOSED OF.
